name: ts-united-examples
description: Top-level package.json of TS United examples. Contains useful scripts.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:backend && npm run install:webpack-frontend && npm run install:cra-frontend && npm run install:react-native-mobile && npm run install:mocha-tests
scripts.install:mocha-tests: npm run install:backend && cd mocha-tests && npm install

author: Roman Melamud
